author: CBS News
title: Coronavirus updates: Governors under pressure; U.S. deaths near 40,000
description: Demonstrators in at least four states planned to protest their states' stay-at-home orders on Sunday.
content:
More than 39,000 people in the U.S. have now been killed by the coronavirus, according to Johns Hopkins University, a figure that has nearly doubled in just eight days. 
Despite the climbing death toll, governors in several states are under increasing pressu… [+981 chars]
